We do a lot of research on restaurants when we travel and are loving that Yelp is making its way around Europe, to guide us to more local restaurants.  We hate landing in tourist traps so we were so happy that a friend who lives in Barcelona told us about La Flauta and Yelp confirmed her recommendation.We tried to book a table but they only reserve tables for larger groups.  we ere told that if we get there between 8-830, we would have no problem. We arrived around 830 and got one of the last tables.   We loved everything we ordered including the sangria blanca.  I don't think you can go wrong. We asked our waiter for some recommendations and everything he suggested was excellent.  The beef with pimientos on top were to die for as was the egg and shredded potato dish.  We loved the asparagus and mushrooms and the croquettes and the Jamon was yummy--especially paired with the egg/potato dish.The atmosphere is bustling and fun and the service is fast.  We felt like we didn't hold back on food or drink and the bill was very reasonable!!
